glsa.title: ClamAV: Multiple issues
glsa.synopsis: ClamAV contains two vulnerabilities that could lead to Denial of Service and evasion of virus scanning.

background.p: ClamAV is an antivirus toolkit. It includes a multi-threaded daemon and a command line scanner.

description.p: ClamAV fails to properly scan ZIP files with special headers (CAN-2005-0133) and base64 encoded images in URLs.

impact.p: By sending a base64 encoded image file in a URL an attacker could evade virus scanning. By sending a specially-crafted ZIP file an attacker could cause a Denial of Service by crashing the clamd daemon.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
